## packet assign ip

Assigns an IP address to a given device

### Synopsis

Example:
  packet assign ip -d [device-id] -a [ip-address]
	

```
packet assign ip [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -a, --address string     --address or -a
  -d, --device-id string   --device-id or -d
  -h, --help               help for ip
```

